korean: 주말 활동이 요즘 많이 바뀐 것 같아요.
예전에는 주말에 주로 밖에 나가서 놀았는데요,
요즘은 집에서 보내는 '홈족' 문화가 많이 늘었어요.
특히 코로나 이후로 집에서 즐기는 활동들이 인기를 얻었죠.
넷플릭스 보기, 게임하기, 요리하기 같은 거요.
그리고 주말에 쇼핑하러 백화점 가는 사람들도 줄었어요.
온라인 쇼핑이 편하니까 굳이 나갈 필요가 없어진 거죠.
거창한 계획보다는 작지만 확실한 행복을 찾는 거요.
동네 카페에서 커피 한잔, 공원 산책 이런 소소한 활동들이요.
한편으로는 주말에도 일하는 사람들이 늘어난 것 같아요.
워라밸이 중요하다고 하지만, 현실은 좀 다른 것 같기도 하고요.
english: I think weekend activities have changed a lot these days.
Before, people mainly went out and played on weekends,
but these days, the 'homebody' culture of spending time at home has increased a lot.
Especially after COVID, activities enjoyed at home gained popularity.
Things like watching Netflix, playing games, cooking.
And the number of people going to department stores to shop on weekends has also decreased.
Since online shopping is convenient, there's no need to go out.
Also, these days the 'small but certain happiness' culture is trending.
Rather than grand plans, finding small but certain happiness.
Small activities like a cup of coffee at a neighborhood cafe, a park walk.
On the other hand, it seems like people working on weekends have also increased.
They say work-life balance is important, but reality seems a bit different.
